FuncDef:
The instance command creates an iFIT instance and displays the IFIT instance view.
The undo instance command deletes a specified iFIT instance.
By default, no iFIT instance is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an iFIT instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure static flows, create an iFIT instance.
Prerequisites
iFIT has been enabled using the ifit command.
